info.title: Chonkie API
info.description: ðŸ¦› Chonkie running on the Internet! ðŸŒŽ Get chunks via POST HTTP calls~

post.description: Validates the provided API key. Use this endpoint to check if your API key is valid and active.

200.description: API key is valid and active

post.description: Splits text into chunks based on token count, ensuring each chunk stays within specified token limits.

tokenizer.title: Tokenizer
tokenizer.description: Tokenizer to use. Can be a string identifier or a tokenizer instance.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

chunk_overlap.title: Chunk Overlap
chunk_overlap.description: Number or percentage of overlapping tokens between chunks.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as `Chunk` objects or plain text strings.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `Chunk` objects.

schema.title: TokenChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `Chunk` objects, each detailing a segment of the original text based on token count.

post.description: Splits text into chunks while preserving complete sentences, ensuring that each chunk maintains proper sentence boundaries and context.

tokenizer_or_token_counter.title: Tokenizer Or Token Counter
tokenizer_or_token_counter.description: Tokenizer or token counting function to use. Can be a string identifier or an instance.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

chunk_overlap.title: Chunk Overlap
chunk_overlap.description: Number of overlapping tokens between chunks.

min_sentences_per_chunk.title: Min Sentences Per Chunk
min_sentences_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of sentences to include in each chunk.

min_characters_per_sentence.title: Min Characters Per Sentence
min_characters_per_sentence.description: Minimum number of characters per sentence.

approximate.title: Approximate
approximate.description: Use approximate token counting for faster processing (deprecated).

include_delim.title: Include Delim
include_delim.description: Include delimiters in the chunk text. If so, specify whether to include the previous or next delimiter.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as text strings or as `SentenceChunk` objects.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `SentenceChunk` objects.

schema.title: SentenceChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `SentenceChunk` objects, each detailing a segment of the original text and the sentences within it.

post.description: Recursively chunks documents into smaller chunks. It is a good choice for documents that are long but well structured.

tokenizer_or_token_counter.title: Tokenizer Or Token Counter
tokenizer_or_token_counter.description: Tokenizer or token counting function to use. Can be a string identifier or an instance.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

recipe.title: Recipe
recipe.description: Pre-defined rules for chunking. Find all recipes on our [Hugging Face Hub](https://huggingface.co/datasets/chonkie-ai/recipes).

lang.title: Language
lang.description: Language of the text, used with recipes. Must match the language of the recipe.

min_characters_per_chunk.title: Min Characters Per Chunk
min_characters_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of characters per chunk.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as text strings or as `RecursiveChunk` objects.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `RecursiveChunk` objects.

schema.title: RecursiveChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `RecursiveChunk` objects, each detailing a segment of the original text and its level in the recursive tree.

post.description: Splits text into chunks based on semantic similarity, ensuring that related content stays together in the same chunk.

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: Model identifier or embedding model instance to use for semantic analysis.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Similarity threshold for grouping sentences. Can be a float [0,1] for direct threshold, int (1,100] for percentile, or 'auto' for automatic calculation.

similarity_window.title: Similarity Window
similarity_window.description: Number of preceding sentences to consider for similarity comparison.

min_sentences.title: Min Sentences
min_sentences.description: Minimum number of sentences per chunk.

min_characters_per_sentence.title: Min Characters Per Sentence
min_characters_per_sentence.description: Minimum number of characters per sentence.

threshold_step.title: Threshold Step
threshold_step.description: Step size used when automatically calculating the similarity threshold.

include_delim.title: Include Delim
include_delim.description: Include delimiters in the chunk text. If so, specify whether to include the previous or next delimiter.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Return type for chunking. If 'chunks', returns a list of `SemanticChunk` objects. If 'texts', returns a list of strings.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `SemanticChunk` objects.

schema.title: SemanticChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `SemanticChunk` objects, detailing segments and sentences with optional embeddings.

post.description: Extends semantic chunking using a double-pass merging approach (Semantic Double-Pass Merging). Connects related content even if not consecutive.

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: Model identifier or embedding model instance to use for semantic analysis.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Similarity threshold for grouping sentences. Can be a float [0,1] for direct threshold, int (1,100] for percentile, or 'auto' for automatic calculation.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Mode for grouping sentences, either 'cumulative' or 'window'.

similarity_window.title: Similarity Window
similarity_window.description: Number of preceding sentences to consider for similarity comparison.

min_sentences.title: Min Sentences
min_sentences.description: Minimum number of sentences per chunk.

min_characters_per_sentence.title: Min Characters Per Sentence
min_characters_per_sentence.description: Minimum number of characters per sentence.

threshold_step.title: Threshold Step
threshold_step.description: Step size used when automatically calculating the similarity threshold.

include_delim.title: Include Delim
include_delim.description: Include delimiters in the chunk text. If so, specify whether to include the previous or next delimiter.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Return type for the chunking process. If 'chunks', returns a list of `SemanticChunk` objects. If 'texts', returns a list of strings.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `SemanticChunk` objects.

schema.title: SDPMChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `SemanticChunk` objects (as SDPM uses semantic chunking), detailing segments and sentences with optional embeddings.

post.description: Implements the late chunking strategy. Encodes the entire text, then splits recursively, deriving chunk embeddings from the full document embedding.

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: SentenceTransformer model identifier to use for embedding.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

recipe.title: Recipe
recipe.description: Pre-defined recursive rules for splitting. Find all recipes on our [Hugging Face Hub](https://huggingface.co/datasets/chonkie-ai/recipes).

lang.title: Language
lang.description: Language of the text, used with recipes. Must match the language of the recipe.

min_characters_per_chunk.title: Min Characters Per Chunk
min_characters_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of characters per chunk.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `LateChunk` objects.

schema.title: LateChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `LateChunk` objects, detailing segments, sentences, and an optional chunk-level embedding derived from the full document.

post.description: Splits code into chunks based on its structure, leveraging Abstract Syntax Trees (ASTs) to create contextually relevant segments.

file.description: The file containing code to be chunked.

tokenizer_or_token_counter.title: Tokenizer Or Token Counter
tokenizer_or_token_counter.description: Tokenizer or token counting function to use for measuring chunk size.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

language.title: Language
language.description: The programming language of the code. Accepts languages supported by `tree-sitter-language-pack`.

include_nodes.title: Include Nodes
include_nodes.description: Whether to include the list of corresponding AST `Node` objects within each `CodeChunk`.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as `CodeChunk` objects or plain text strings.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `CodeChunk` objects.

schema.title: CodeChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `CodeChunk` objects, each detailing a segment of the original code and optionally the corresponding AST nodes.

post.description: Splits text using a fine-tuned BERT model to detect semantic shifts, creating topic-coherent chunks.

model.title: Model
model.description: The identifier of the fine-tuned BERT model to use.

min_characters_per_chunk.title: Min Characters Per Chunk
min_characters_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of characters required for a valid chunk.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as `Chunk` objects or plain text strings.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `Chunk` objects.

schema.title: NeuralChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `Chunk` objects, representing segments split based on semantic shifts detected by the neural model.

post.description: Agentic chunking powered by generative models (via Genie interface) for intelligent text splitting.

tokenizer_or_token_counter.title: Tokenizer Or Token Counter
tokenizer_or_token_counter.description: Tokenizer used for initial splitting and size estimation.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Target maximum tokens per chunk for the generative model.

candidate_size.title: Candidate Size
candidate_size.description: Number of tokens around a potential split point examined by the generative model.

min_characters_per_chunk.title: Min Characters Per Chunk
min_characters_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of characters required for a valid chunk.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as `Chunk` objects or plain text strings.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `Chunk` objects.

schema.title: SlumberChunkResponse
schema.description: A list containing `Chunk` objects, representing segments intelligently split by the agentic chunker.

post.description: Adds embeddings to a list of provided chunks using a specified embedding model.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `Chunk` objects with added embeddings.

schema.title: EmbeddingsRefineResponse
schema.description: A list containing `Chunk` objects, each with an added `embedding` field.

post.description: Adds overlapping context (prefix or suffix) to a list of provided chunks based on specified arguments.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of `Chunk` objects with added overlap context.

schema.title: OverlapRefineResponse
schema.description: A list containing `Chunk` objects, potentially modified to include overlapping text or context.

BearerAuth.description: Your API Key from the [Chonkie Cloud dashboard](https://cloud.chonkie.ai/keys)

Chunk.title: Chunk
Chunk.description: Base representation of a text chunk with core metadata.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text content of the chunk.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the chunk within the original input text.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the chunk within the original input text.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific chunk, according to the tokenizer used.

SentenceSchema.title: Sentence
SentenceSchema.description: Represents a single sentence with metadata, used within sentence-based chunks.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text content of the sentence.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the sentence within the original input text.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the sentence within the original input text.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific sentence, according to the tokenizer used.

SemanticSentenceSchema.title: SemanticSentence
SemanticSentenceSchema.description: Represents a single sentence within a semantic chunk, including an optional embedding vector.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text content of the sentence.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the sentence within the original input text.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the sentence within the original input text.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific sentence, according to the tokenizer used.

embedding.title: Embedding
embedding.description: Optional embedding vector (list of floats) for the sentence.

SentenceChunkSchema.title: SentenceChunk
SentenceChunkSchema.description: Represents a chunk of text composed of one or more `Sentence` objects.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text content of the chunk.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the chunk within the original input text.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the chunk within the original input text.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific chunk, according to the tokenizer used.

sentences.title: Sentences
sentences.description: List of `Sentence` objects contained within this chunk.

RecursiveChunkSchema.title: RecursiveChunk
RecursiveChunkSchema.description: Represents a chunk generated by the Recursive Chunker, including its level in the recursive hierarchy.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text content of the chunk.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the chunk within the original input text.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the chunk within the original input text.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific chunk, according to the tokenizer used.

level.title: Level
level.description: The level of this chunk in the recursive splitting process (starts from 0).

SemanticChunkSchema.title: SemanticChunk
SemanticChunkSchema.description: Represents a chunk generated by semantic chunking methods (Semantic, SDPM), containing `SemanticSentence` objects potentially with embeddings.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text content of the chunk.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the chunk within the original input text.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the chunk within the original input text.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific chunk, according to the tokenizer used.

sentences.title: Sentences
sentences.description: List of `SemanticSentence` objects contained within this chunk.

LateChunkSchema.title: LateChunk
LateChunkSchema.description: Represents a chunk generated by the Late Chunker, containing standard sentences and an optional chunk-level embedding derived from the full document.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text content of the chunk.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the chunk within the original input text.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the chunk within the original input text.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific chunk, according to the tokenizer used.

sentences.title: Sentences
sentences.description: List of standard `Sentence` objects contained within this chunk.

embedding.title: Embedding
embedding.description: Optional embedding vector (list of floats) for the entire chunk, derived from the full document embedding.

ChunkWithEmbedding.title: ChunkWithEmbedding
ChunkWithEmbedding.description: Represents a text chunk including an embedding vector.

embedding.title: Embedding
embedding.description: Embedding vector (list of floats) for the chunk.

NodeSchema.title: Node
NodeSchema.description: Represents a node in the Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) of the code, used by CodeChunker.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text content of the node.

start_byte.title: Start Byte
start_byte.description: The starting byte index of the node within the original code text.

end_byte.title: End Byte
end_byte.description: The ending byte index (exclusive) of the node within the original code text.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the AST node (e.g., 'function_definition', 'identifier').

CodeChunkSchema.title: CodeChunk
CodeChunkSchema.description: Represents a chunk generated by the Code Chunker, containing a code snippet and optionally corresponding AST nodes.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual code text content of the chunk.

start_index.title: Start Index
start_index.description: The starting character index of the chunk within the original input code.

end_index.title: End Index
end_index.description: The ending character index (exclusive) of the chunk within the original input code.

token_count.title: Token Count
token_count.description: The number of tokens in this specific chunk, according to the tokenizer used.

nodes.title: Nodes
nodes.description: Optional list of AST `Node` objects corresponding to this code chunk (present if `include_nodes` is true).

EmbeddingsRefineryREQ.title: EmbeddingsRefineryREQ
EmbeddingsRefineryREQ.description: Request body for the Embeddings Refinery endpoint.

chunks.title: Chunks
chunks.description: A list of `Chunk` objects (as dictionaries) to add embeddings to.

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: Model identifier (e.g., from Hugging Face) or a compatible embedding model instance string representation.

OverlapRefineryREQ.title: OverlapRefineryREQ
OverlapRefineryREQ.description: Request body for the Overlap Refinery endpoint.

chunks.title: Chunks
chunks.description: A list of `Chunk` objects (as dictionaries) to refine with overlap.

tokenizer_or_token_counter.title: Tokenizer Or Token Counter
tokenizer_or_token_counter.description: Tokenizer identifier (e.g., 'gpt2') or 'character' for character counting.

context_size.title: Context Size
context_size.description: Size of the overlap context (absolute tokens if int, fraction if float).

method.title: Method
method.description: Method for adding context ('suffix' from next, 'prefix' from previous).

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: Recursive rules definition (object representation) if mode is 'recursive'.

merge.title: Merge
merge.description: If true, merge context into chunk text; otherwise, store in 'context' field.

ErrorRES.title: ErrorRES
ErrorRES.description: Error response for the Chonkie API.

LateChunkerREQ.title: LateChunkerREQ
LateChunkerREQ.description: Data to pass to the Late Chunker.

text.title: Text
text.description: The input text or list of texts to be chunked.

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: SentenceTransformer model identifier to use for embedding.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

recipe.title: Recipe
recipe.description: Pre-defined recursive rules for splitting. Find all recipes on our [Hugging Face Hub](https://huggingface.co/datasets/chonkie-ai/recipes).

lang.title: Language
lang.description: Language of the text, used with recipes. Must match the language of the recipe.

min_characters_per_chunk.title: Min Characters Per Sentence
min_characters_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of characters per sentence.

RecursiveChunkerREQ.title: RecursiveChunkerREQ
RecursiveChunkerREQ.description: Data to pass to the Recursive Character Text Splitter.

text.title: Text
text.description: The input text or list of texts to be chunked.

tokenizer_or_token_counter.title: Tokenizer Or Token Counter
tokenizer_or_token_counter.description: Tokenizer or token counting function to use. Can be a string identifier or an instance.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

recipe.title: Recipe
recipe.description: Pre-defined rules for chunking. Find all recipes on our [Hugging Face Hub](https://huggingface.co/datasets/chonkie-ai/recipes).

lang.title: Language
lang.description: Language of the text, used with recipes. Must match the language of the recipe.

min_characters_per_chunk.title: Min Characters Per Chunk
min_characters_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of characters per chunk.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as text strings or as `RecursiveChunk` objects.

SDPMChunkerREQ.title: SDPMChunkerREQ
SDPMChunkerREQ.description: Data to pass to the SDPM Chunker.

text.title: Text
text.description: The input text or list of texts to be chunked.

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: Model identifier or embedding model instance to use for semantic analysis.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Similarity threshold for grouping sentences. Can be a float [0,1] for direct threshold, int (1,100] for percentile, or 'auto' for automatic calculation.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Mode for grouping sentences, either 'cumulative' or 'window'.

similarity_window.title: Similarity Window
similarity_window.description: Number of preceding sentences to consider for similarity comparison.

min_sentences.title: Min Sentences
min_sentences.description: Minimum number of sentences per chunk.

min_characters_per_sentence.title: Min Characters Per Sentence
min_characters_per_sentence.description: Minimum number of characters per sentence.

threshold_step.title: Threshold Step
threshold_step.description: Step size used when automatically calculating the similarity threshold.

skip_window.title: Skip Window
skip_window.description: Number of chunks to skip when looking for similarities in the second pass.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Return type for the chunking process. If 'chunks', returns a list of `SemanticChunk` objects. If 'texts', returns a list of strings.

SemanticChunkerREQ.title: SemanticChunkerREQ
SemanticChunkerREQ.description: Data to pass to the Semantic Chunker.

text.title: Text
text.description: The input text or list of texts to be chunked.

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: Model identifier or embedding model instance to use for semantic analysis.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Similarity threshold for grouping sentences. Can be a float [0,1] for direct threshold, int (1,100] for percentile, or 'auto' for automatic calculation.

similarity_window.title: Similarity Window
similarity_window.description: Number of preceding sentences to consider for similarity comparison.

min_sentences.title: Min Sentences
min_sentences.description: Minimum number of sentences per chunk.

min_characters_per_sentence.title: Min Characters Per Sentence
min_characters_per_sentence.description: Minimum number of characters per sentence.

threshold_step.title: Threshold Step
threshold_step.description: Step size used when automatically calculating the similarity threshold.

include_delim.title: Include Delim
include_delim.description: Include delimiters in the chunk text. If so, specify whether to include the previous or next delimiter.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Return type for chunking. If 'chunks', returns a list of `SemanticChunk` objects. If 'texts', returns a list of strings.

SentenceChunkerREQ.title: SentenceChunkerREQ
SentenceChunkerREQ.description: Data to pass to the Sentence Chunker.

text.title: Text
text.description: The input text or list of texts to be chunked.

tokenizer_or_token_counter.title: Tokenizer Or Token Counter
tokenizer_or_token_counter.description: Tokenizer or token counting function to use. Can be a string identifier or an instance.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per chunk.

chunk_overlap.title: Chunk Overlap
chunk_overlap.description: Number of overlapping tokens between chunks.

min_sentences_per_chunk.title: Min Sentences Per Chunk
min_sentences_per_chunk.description: Minimum number of sentences to include in each chunk.

min_characters_per_sentence.title: Min Characters Per Sentence
min_characters_per_sentence.description: Minimum number of characters per sentence.

approximate.title: Approximate
approximate.description: Use approximate token counting for faster processing (deprecated).

include_delim.title: Include Delim
include_delim.description: Include delimiters in the chunk text. If so, specify whether to include the previous or next delimiter.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: Whether to return chunks as text strings or as `SentenceChunk` objects.

TokenChunkerREQ.title: TokenChunkerREQ
TokenChunkerREQ.description: Data to pass to the Token Chunker.

text.title: Text
text.description: The input text or list of texts to be chunked.

tokenizer.title: Tokenizer
tokenizer.description: Tokenizer to use. Can be a string identifier or a tokenizer instance

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size

WordChunkerREQ.description: Data to pass to the Word Chunker.
